title: One of the Websites Ever Made

items.title: Tunic is a cool game
items.summary: What can I say I had a lot of fun playing this game. It is a weird mix between old 2D Zelda games, Dark Souls, and Fez. It is a perfect simulator for becoming a toddler again, that is, not being able to read anything…
items.content_html:
What can I say

I had a lot of fun playing this game. It is a weird mix between old 2D Zelda games, Dark Souls, and Fez. It is a perfect simulator for becoming a toddler again, that is, not being able to read anything except a few words.

If you don’t want the language spoiled, do not continue, it was a lot of fun figuring it out, and I don’t want to ruin it for anyone. Frankly, I didn’t figure the whole language out myself, whilst playing the game, A friend looked up how the language worked when I was really struggling to figure out how it worked, and he fed me some very important (but small) hints.
